content:
For the provided topic, locate three most credible online courses. 
Advanced web development techniques

For advanced web development techniques, here are three credible online courses that you might find beneficial:

1. **Coursera - "Advanced Styling with Responsive Design"**
   - Offered by the University of London, this course is part of the Web Design for Everybody specialization. It delves into responsive design techniques using HTML5 and CSS3, ensuring your web applications look great on all devices.
   - [Course Link](https://www.coursera.org/learn/advanced-styling)

2. **Udacity - "Full Stack Web Developer Nanodegree"**
   - This comprehensive program covers both front-end and back-end development, focusing on advanced topics such as server-side development, database management, and RESTful API design.
   - [Course Link](https://www.udacity.com/course/full-stack-web-developer-nanodegree--nd0044)

3. **edX - "CS50's Web Programming with Python and JavaScript"**
   - Offered by Harvard University, this course dives into the intricacies of web programming, covering topics like databases, web APIs, and modern web app development using frameworks like Django, Flask, and React.
   - [Course Link](https://www.edx.org/course/cs50s-web-programming-with-python-and-javascript)

These platforms and courses provide in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience, helping you advance your web development skills.
